meanings.sent1: She miscounted the candies and thought there were more than there actually were.
meanings.sent2: He miscounted the money in the cash register and had to recount it.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous elf miscounted the number of cookies he ate and blamed it on the dog.
meanings.sent4: Her heart miscounted the beats when she saw him walk into the room.
meanings.sent5: The child's laughter miscounted the joy of the moment.
